recap_documents.description: ORDER granting 10 Defendant's Motion to Stay case and compel arbitration. The parties are compelled to arbitrate Plaintiffs claims in accordance with the Arbitration Agreement. The action is hereby stayed pursuant to 9 U.S.C. ยง 3 pending arbitration. Defendant is ordered to file a status report with the Court 180 days after this orders issuance, and every 180 days thereafter, until this matter is no longer stayed. Signed by Judge Anthony J. Battaglia on 7/07/2016. (jpp) (Entered: 07/07/2016)
